name: CONFERENCES AS SOLUTION
detail: Communities like us can play an essential role   by offering equal opportunities to all.

name: APPLY TO SPEAK
detail: As we continue to grow our lineup of product speakers, we want to open the stage and give our community a chance to apply for a speaking slot.

name: REASONS TO ATTEND
detail: Attending conferences with others can offer a multitude of benefits that can enhance your experience and professional growth.

name: THE EVOLUTION
detail: We’re back for our next instalment of your favourite product conference, but this year we’re doing it a little differently... check out our plans for this year below

name: IMPORTANCE OF INCLUSION
detail: We chatted to leading women in product about the importance of diversity and inclusion in our product teams.

name: FROM THE BLOG
detail: The latest thinking, ideas and opinions on digital product from the  team and community.
